sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core';
import PorgramDetails from '../assets/data/HeaderInfo.json'
import { ProgramDataInterface } from './Myinterfaces/ProgramDetailsinterface';
@Component({
  selector: 'app-root',
  templateUrl: './app.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./app.component.css']
})
export class AppComponent {
  title = 'Assignment4';


  externalProgramData: ProgramDataInterface = PorgramDetails.ProgramData

}


<router-outlet>
<header>

  <app-header></app-header>

</header>
<footer>
  <app-footer></app-footer>


</footer>

<app-list-of-movies></app-list-of-movies>
<app-movie-screens></app-movie-screens>
</router-outlet>


<mat-tab-group>
  <!-- First Tab: List of Movies Component -->
  <mat-tab label="List of Movies">
    <app-list-of-movies [fetchExternalMovies]="externalMovieInfo"></app-list-of-movies>
  </mat-tab>
